name: @hama/g2p
description: ONNX-powered grapheme-to-phoneme inference for Node, Bun, and browsers.

scripts.build: bun run build:node && bun run build:browser
scripts.build:node: tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && rm -rf dist/node/assets && mkdir -p dist/node/assets && cp -R src/assets/. dist/node/assets
scripts.build:browser: tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json && rm -rf dist/browser/assets && mkdir -p dist/browser/assets && cp -R src/assets/. dist/browser/assets

author: hama contributors
